text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <PREFACE>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchdruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:</PREFACE>

  <BIBL n="1">
    <AUTHOR>J. H. Ringieri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Cœna Dominica.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3 Vol.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1680</YEAR>
    <NOTE>das Exemplar in albo achthalben</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="2">
    <AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE type="normal">10 Batzen</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE type="Schreibpapier">14 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="3">
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="4">
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerk, d. i. Erklärung und Gebet über den Heidelberger Catechismus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupfer-Blatt, haltet 15 und einen halben Bogen</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>5 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="5">
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="6">
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinder Gottes</TITLE>
    <NOTE>gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Psalms</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>9.1</FORMAT>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"• Wrapped text that lay outside of any tag in <PREFACE> for well-formedness.
• Added attribute n="…" to each <BIBL> to preserve original enumeration numbers.
• Introduced <NOTE> elements for explanatory prose that was previously free-floating.
• Harmonised tag names: replaced the erroneous </PRICE> with </PRIZE> and removed mixed full stops/commas inside tag content.
• Removed stray punctuation (periods and commas) that were outside tags and moved meaningful content inside tags.
• Normalised repeated <FORMAT> and <PLACE> elements by stripping trailing punctuation.
• Encoded German diacritics directly in UTF-8 instead of escaped byte sequences.
• Added missing spaces and full stops inside author and title fields for readability.
• Ensured every opened element is properly closed and nesting is consistent.
• Converted enumeration text ("1.", "2." …) to structured attributes instead of inline prose.
• Removed duplicate wording caused by OCR noise (e.g. doubled letters) where obvious.
• Verified overall well-formed XML by passing through an XML validator."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM>
  <PREFACE>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchdruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als:</PREFACE>

  <BIBL n="1">
    <AUTHOR>J. H. Ringieri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Cœna Dominica.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3 Vol.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1680</YEAR>
    <NOTE>das Exemplar in albo achthalben</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="2">
    <AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE type="normal">10 Batzen</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE type="Schreibpapier">14 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="3">
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="4">
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerk, d. i. Erklärung und Gebet über den Heidelberger Catechismus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupfer-Blatt, haltet 15 und einen halben Bogen</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>5 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="5">
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL n="6">
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinder Gottes</TITLE>
    <NOTE>gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Psalms</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>9.1</FORMAT>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5 Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>

</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
• Wrapped text that lay outside of any tag in <PREFACE> for well-formedness.
• Added attribute n="…" to each <BIBL> to preserve original enumeration numbers.
• Introduced <NOTE> elements for explanatory prose that was previously free-floating.
• Harmonised tag names: replaced the erroneous </PRICE> with </PRIZE> and removed mixed full stops/commas inside tag content.
• Removed stray punctuation (periods and commas) that were outside tags and moved meaningful content inside tags.
• Normalised repeated <FORMAT> and <PLACE> elements by stripping trailing punctuation.
• Encoded German diacritics directly in UTF-8 instead of escaped byte sequences.
• Added missing spaces and full stops inside author and title fields for readability.
• Ensured every opened element is properly closed and nesting is consistent.
• Converted enumeration text ("1.", "2." …) to structured attributes instead of inline prose.
• Removed duplicate wording caused by OCR noise (e.g. doubled letters) where obvious.
• Verified overall well-formed XML by passing through an XML validator.
